attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordon Brown,
 
Please put pressure on the IMF and the world community to relieve Haiti of its debt. The people of Haiti do not need anymore loans, they need grants.
 
If we want a strong recovery for the people of Haiti this is a must.

Naomi Klein details this further in this 4 minute video.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EsGDP-yfduo
